snippet: Julia Roberts’s personal style can run counter to the norm for awards shows and benefits.
abstract: Julia Roberts, Academy Award nominee for her role in film August: Osage County, is known for a laid back personal style, but has been spotted wearing high heels and fussy clothes on the red carpet this awards season.
lead_paragraph: Julia Roberts’s personal style can run counter to the norm for awards shows and benefits.

headline.print_headline: At Ease, Low-Key and High Profile
headline.seo: Julia Roberts: The Red Carpet Fashion Choices of the ‘August: Osage County’ Star
headline.main: At Ease, Low-Key and High Profile
